adv.js: { local.count_notif = await db.t_notif.count({ where: { id_user: Number(user.id), read: false, }, }); local.render() }} > {children}
{ sessionStorage.setItem("previousPage", window.location.href); sessionStorage.setItem("root", "/staff-pengajar/home"); }} > {children}

{ const all = await db.t_logbook_status.findMany({ where: { id_user: user.id, status: "pending", }, select: { id_logbook: true, }, orderBy: { date_time: "desc", }, }); const count_list = await db.t_logbook.count({ where: { id: { in: all.map((e) => e.id_logbook), }, }, }); const list = await db.t_logbook.findMany({ where: { id: { in: all.filter((e, idx) => idx <= 3).map((e) => e.id_logbook), }, }, select: { id: true, id_action: true, m_action: { select: { name: true, }, }, m_user: { select: { display_name: true, }, }, date: true, }, orderBy: { date: "desc" } }); local.list = list.map((e) => { return { id: e.id, id_action: e.id_action, title: e.m_action.name, message: e.m_user.display_name, date: moment(e.date).format("DD MMM YYYY HH:mm"), }; }); local.count = Number(count_list); local.render(); }} > {children}
